synopsis: Welcome back to Hope's Peak High School! Attending class is optional, right?
Chisa Yukizome continues her mission to bring the students in her homeroom class closer together.

title.jp: Subete no Mirai ni Sayonara wo

synopsis: Hinata finds another Reserve Course student who dreams of joining the Main Course - and who is willing to take drastic measures to get there.

title.jp: Komaeda Nagito no Yuuutsu to Kyougaku to Shoushitsu

synopsis: It's practical exam time for class 1-B!
Instructor Yukizome returns to her homeroom class after being transferred to the Reserve Course and learns that a lot can change in four months!
Is there any hope for those without talent - or only despair?

title.jp: Kibougamine Gakuen Shijousaidai Saiaku no Jiken

synopsis: With Ryota Mitarai as your guide, witness the true power of anime!

title.jp: Guuzen ni mo Saiaku na Saikai

synopsis: Hope's Peak is plunged into despair after the Student Council's massacre, and Komaeda tests his luck.
Nanami and Komaeda escape from despair, but can they protect their classmates, or save their teacher?

title.jp: Kimi wa Kibou to Iu Na no Zetsubou ni Hohoemu

synopsis: Betrayal - the ultimate weapon in the game of Despair.
Hope's Peak will recite - its death haiku of Despair - for no hope remains.
